call_overview.call_topic: Debt consolidation and enrollment in debt resolution program
call_overview.call_purpose: To review customer financials, discuss loan/debt consolidation options, and complete enrollment
call_overview.call_outcome: Customer was enrolled but significant compliance issues were identified
call_overview.overall_tone: Courteous but with significant compliance issue regarding accurate representation
call_overview.manager_review_reason: Multiple compliance violations: failure to accurately represent program impact on credit reporting.

manager_focus_areas.speaker: handling agent
manager_focus_areas.quote: whenever we pull up the credit report, we pull it up as a soft pull so you don't have any inquiries on your profile. Do we have your appointment to proceed?
manager_focus_areas.context: During early agenda, prior to financial data collection

call_recording_disclosure_evidence.speaker: handling agent
call_recording_disclosure_evidence.quote: This is Lamel with Penny on a recorded line. How are you doing?

credit_pull_consent_evidence.speaker: handling agent
credit_pull_consent_evidence.quote: whenever we pull up the credit report, we pull it up as a soft pull. Do we have your appointment to proceed?
credit_pull_consent_evidence.context: Early in call before pulling credit

social_security_verification_evidence.speaker: handling agent
social_security_verification_evidence.quote: So if you click in the screen, you should be able to put the last 4 of your social.

accurate_representations_violations: Agent incorrectly stated that enrolled debts appear as closed and settled without months of missed payment reporting.

evidence.speaker: handling agent
evidence.quote: So when it shows closed, that's why clients are able to get that settlement. After you get the settlement within your term, it shows settled and paid.
evidence.context: Agent implies accounts will NOT show missed payments

evidence.speaker: contact
evidence.quote: that's not what he told me. He told me something completely different.

misleading_claims_violations: Agent presented debt resolution credit reporting impact as much less severe than reality.
compliance_violations: Failure to obtain explicit verbal consent for credit pull.
critical_moments: Agent's inaccurate summary of resolution program's credit reporting process directly resulted in customer confusion.

professional_tone_examples: No. Take your time. I wanna make sure you get your numbers right anyway so I could help you.
active_listening_examples: Agent paused to clarify income and double-checked numbers.
patience_empathy_examples: No. Take your time. and patiently continued the process.
clear_communication_examples: Agent gave step-by-step instruction with DocuSign and bank account setup.
customer_focused_examples: You do what works for you.
customer_experience_scorecard.customer_experience_notes: Agent was courteous but key misrepresentation caused confusion.
notable_interactions: Customer explicitly sought reassurance about credit reporting; agent provided inaccurate info.

sales_process_scorecard.step1_location: Opening: agent introduces self, gives call recording disclosure.
sales_process_scorecard.step2_location: Detailed review of debts, credit utilization.
missed_opportunities: Failed to clarify honestly about negative short-term credit reporting impact.
sales_process_scorecard.process_notes: Agent followed step structure but undermined educational element.
key_process_moments: Agent walked through projections and minimum payment math.
Warm transfer was executed as required.

strengths: High patience and empathy; agent built strong rapport.
Thorough data collection and adaptive pacing.
areas_for_improvement: Must obtain explicit, standalone verbal consent for credit pull.
Must provide full, honest disclosure regarding negative short-term credit impacts.
specific_coaching_points: Always use required credit pull consent language.
Provide balanced explanation of resolution program.
training_recommendations: Refresher on compliance scripting for credit pulls.
Role-play scenarios explaining credit reporting consequences.
